Text:
function RIR_EP05_17()
    -- .結-2【3月第1週】「雑草が咲かせた花」
    SaveData.Title = "雑草が咲かせた花"

    -- //BG：大講堂正面（照明なし）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG020ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0112.wav")
    MSG([[
    【????】
 "Why don't you understand!!!" ]])
    -- //ネメシア

    MSG([[ As I reached the hall of the chapel, I heard a shout. ]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ba")
    -- //BU；リラ（真剣）、ネメシア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MEN01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM05.wav")

    MSG([[ On the stage, two women faced each other. ]])

    MSG([[ One was Lira, and the other was Nemesia. Once said to have a mentor-student relationship, the two were grasping each other's shoulders as if wrestling. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0113.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "How many times do I have to say it for you to understand? You just need to withdraw from tomorrow's Princess Election as I demanded!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0114.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "Otherwise, you will lose everything. Tomorrow, we’re bringing in TV stations to make a big deal out of it." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MEN01qa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0115.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "I wonder what will happen if your true face is revealed in the middle of all that?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0116.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "The popularity you’ve built up so far! Your status! Your fame! You will lose it ALL!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1276.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Don't underestimate my fans. They’re not the kind to leave over one or two lies you spread!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0117.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "How naive~ <sprite="Emoji" name="note"> It’s like your brain is filled with sugar, so sweet! You’re dead wrong if you think the fans will protect you!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0118.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "Once fans wake up from their dream—no, the ones who wake up—them all come together to beat you down! Until you’re completely crushed!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_1200.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Anxious
 (W-what a cruel threat...!) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Nemesia’s terrifying threat from the stage sent chills down my spine. ]])

    MSG([[ She’d expose Lira’s true face on television just because she can’t get her way? ]])

    MSG([[ I can’t believe a human would do such a thing. No matter how much she’s Lira’s mentor who taught her how to be cute, I can’t ignore such tyranny. ]])

    MSG([[ I don’t care what happens to me anymore. I dashed toward the stage, determined to take Lira’s place immediately— ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ba")
    -- //BU：ネメシア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM19.wav")

    MSG([[ Frozen under Nemesia’s glare, I stopped moving. ]])

    MSG([[ But if I showed even a hint of weakness here, it would be over. I stood my ground and challenged Nemesia. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1277.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Nemesia, why are you threatening like this? You weren’t the kind of person who did such things in the past." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1278.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "You were stubborn and pushy, sure, but all for the pursuit of ‘beauty.’ You weren’t the person to full-on threaten a young girl!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0119.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "What kind of convenient image are you forcing on me~? I’ve been a woman who uses any means from the start." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0120.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "I’m not like a child like you—I plan to fight the world. I can’t pick and choose my methods if I want to win, can I~?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0121.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "Exactly. I don’t have the luxury to choose. To avenge my sister Alum, and for the sake of that girl who will soon disappear." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0122.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "And above all, to prevent ordinary people like you from falling into despair! I cannot stop!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ ――Alum. That’s a name I know too. ]])

    MSG([[ Believing this was Nemesia’s weak spot, I grabbed onto that topic. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1279.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "...Alum, she’s the older sister you did idol work with, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0123.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Flustered
 "...What!? How do you know that?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07fc")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1280.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wry smile
 "Because you’re my root for wanting to become cute. Of course I researched." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1281.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "Nemesia, you did idol activities with your sister. But her popularity was overwhelmingly higher." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07da")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1282.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Sad
 "You too… you were called one of the ordinary fools you look down on. Isn’t that why you cared for ordinary people like me?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0124.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Flustered
 "Ugh...! Enough with these delusions. Unlike you, I was born blessed with looks and talent!" ]])

    MSG([[ Her voice wavering, Nemesia pressed on. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0125.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "That’s right, I was just outshined by my sister. And even she… after dying in an accident, no one remembers her now." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0126.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "There are fewer than ten people at this academy who know the name Alum Himegami, despite her being a Princess who thrilled the school!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ra")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0127.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Sad
 "You don’t understand. The fear of being forgotten, the pain... the despair! How brutally quickly people’s interests shift!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0128.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "The Yuriai Private Academy’s ‘Four Princesses System’ exemplifies that cruelty. The old tradition should just disappear." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1283.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "The ‘Four Princesses System’… should disappear?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Unable to accept this, I interrupted Nemesia’s words. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1284.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Is aiming to be a ‘Princess’ a bad thing? Is longing for the view from this stage really so wrong?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1285.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Weren’t you one of those who aimed to be a ‘Princess’? Then why is it wrong?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0129.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "Heh, how naive. You may be happy with the attention now, but the title ‘Princess’ will soon be forgotten." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0130.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "When Alum—who was called a national idol—died, the world only pretended to mourn for a while before quickly losing interest." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0131.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "They ignored the sister left behind, shifting their attention to other idols. That’s when the sister realized." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0132.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "It’s better not to become cute at all if you’re just going to be forgotten." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0133.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "There’ll come a day when you regret trying to become cute. You will regret it!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ca")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1286.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Surprised
 "N-no way! I don’t have regrets!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I couldn’t retort smoothly and hesitated. What exactly was I aiming for after becoming cute? ]])

    MSG([[ Wanting to be admired? If so, maybe Nemesia’s right. If I keep working this way, can I truly say I have no regrets? ]])

    MSG([[ Not even I knew what I wanted anymore, and I dropped to the floor. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0134.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "Lost for words, huh? You really do know deep down, don’t you? You’re turning away from the emptiness of your efforts and the limits of your talent." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0135.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "I chose work related to ‘beauty’ to control the values of ‘beauty’ with these hands." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0136.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "From now on, Hermes and I will set this country’s standard of ‘beauty.’" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0137.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "It’s tragic how such an ordinary fool like you could misunderstand and waste her precious youth for fleeting glory." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ga")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1287.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Anxious
 "I-I... I’m..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0138.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Normal
 "Stop pretending to be strong already." ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia approached me gently and whispered as my shoulders shook silently. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0139.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Sad
 "Give up before reality hits... miserable, ugly little weed." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    STOP_BGM(1000)

    -- //BG：駅前（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002ca")
    -- //BU；エリカ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ ――Please don’t ever call yourself ‘not cute’ again. ]])

    -- //BG：ステージ上
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG024ba")
    -- //BU：ネメシア（悲しみ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ra")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ca")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1288.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Surprised
 "I am――" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    PLAY_BGM("BGM10.wav")

    MSG([[ At that moment, the important words of “him” came to mind. ]])

    -- //特殊選択肢　⇒カワイイ

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP05_1_RIR,"ミナトくんがアタシに対して言ってくれた言葉は？")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_09", "RIR_EP05_17")
        return
    end

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1289.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "I’m absolutely the cutest, aren’t I! Don’t you dare say whatever you want, old lady!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0140.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Flustered
 "O-old lady!?" ]])

    MSG([[ I shouted as I stood and pushed Nemesia away as she approached. ]])

    MSG([[ The fog in my head cleared. I felt foolish for sulking. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0141.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Flustered
 "What did you just say all of a sudden!?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0142.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "You see perfectly well from my words how foolish and pointless your efforts are." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ia")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1290.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Wink
 "You don’t get it~. Don’t say things you don’t know about, like how much effort I've put in." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1291.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "I’m sure a year ago, I would’ve accepted your demand. I thought I couldn’t beat the real thing." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ea")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1292.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "But now, I know. That a fake flower through effort was loved by the whole academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0143.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Flustered
 "A fake flower...!? Who is the one that changed you so much?" ]])

    MSG([[ Answering Nemesia’s question, I shouted the name of my greatest rival and most precious “him” in the world. ]])

    -- //特殊選択肢　※ネメシアの否定の台詞が多数
    -- 　⇒伊草ミナト

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP05_2_RIR,"最高のライバルにして、世界で一番大切な“彼“とは？")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_09", "RIR_EP05_17")
        return
    end

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1293.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "—Minato Ikusa! The lover you hurt with your own hands!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ea")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1294.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "Minato’s amazing. He really wanted to be manly, but for me, he polished his cuteness and charmed the entire academy." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1295.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "No matter who in the world forgets, I won’t forget Minato’s efforts. And I’m sure Minato won’t forget me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1296.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Fake flowers, weeds, ordinary people—we all have someone who loves us sincerely. Your words are completely off the mark." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0144.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "Hy-hyahaha...HAHAHA!! What are you going on about? That crossdressing boy?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MEN01qa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0145.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Mocking
 "What does being loved by a man like that even mean? Pathetic fools licking each other's wounds? So pathetic~" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ca")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1297.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Surprised
 "Ah—" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Suddenly, Nemesia lunged and grabbed my shoulder. ]])

    MSG([[ With overwhelming force, I couldn’t move at all. She didn’t seem like the same woman anymore. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MEN01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0146.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "You’re so pathetic it makes me angry... If you won’t listen, I’ll restrain you by force." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0147.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "There’s no chance Hermes will lose to someone like you, but I’ll erase all uncertainties! That’s Himegami quality! You’ll sleep for a while!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07da")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1298.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Sad
 "G-ghhh..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Pain shot through my shoulder and I couldn’t stand. ]])

    MSG([[ To think she’d resort to such direct violence. The woman I admired had become unrecognizable, and I was doubly shocked. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07da")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1299.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Sad
 (I can’t... Why is Nemesia doing this...?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ But just as I was about to give out— ]])

    MSG([[ A familiar figure appeared in the corner of my vision. Seeing it, I gritted my teeth and started looking for the right moment. ]])

    MSG([[ Enduring the agony, I summoned the last of my strength and shouted at full volume. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1300.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Say whatever you want...! There are flowers that only grow weeds! And flowers only a fake can express!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Finally, I heard ‘his’ signal. ]])

    -- //特殊選択肢
    -- 　⇒今ですリラさん！

    local result = HimeSenkyo(SenkyoData.EP05_3_RIR,"”彼”からの合図を待とう")

    if result == false then
        NazenanoBokuhime("EP_BAD_09", "RIR_EP05_17")
        return
    end

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ba")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1301.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Serious
 "Ugly, male, me, Minato—anyone—everyone has the right to become cuteーーー!!!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_MEN01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0148.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Flustered
 "This girl—!? Where is she getting such power from—" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia tried to shake me off violently, then tried to pin me down harder. ]])

    MSG([[ Taking advantage of the big opening that appeared—‘he’ lunged. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    -- //BU：ネメシア（焦り）、ミナト・私服（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-300,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_MIN03ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,500,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,200,0,500,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0149.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Flustered
 "Y-you’re—" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1201.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Serious
 "Lira!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ Minato slipped into Nemesia’s embrace and, in a blur, spun around swiftly. ]])

    -- //SE：身を翻す音
    PLAY_SE("SEc022.wav")
    WAIT(300)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0150.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Flustered
 "Wha—!?" ]])

    -- //BU：ミナト・私服（真剣）
    -- //effect：ネメシアのBUが画面外へと飛んでいくような消え方

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask030",300,false)

    MSG([[ Like a typhoon. The storm Minato created easily blew Nemesia off the stage. ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia tumbled down the stage, leaving just Minato and me alone. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BUL_MIN03ja")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,200,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1202.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Tears of joy
 "Sorry. I’m a bit late." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07aa")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1302.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Normal
 "How did you know... That’s a dumb question. Thanks for coming, Minato." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1203.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】Casual・Tears of joy
 "I’m glad I made it... really." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07ea")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1303.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】Smile
 "...Dummy. I’m the one who wants to cry. I was seriously scared." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    -- //BU：ミナト・私服（泣き笑い）、ネメシア（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MEN01ba")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-500,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-300,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nemesia_0151.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Nemesia】Serious
 "It’s not over yet!!! Neither of you will leave here!!!" ]])

    MSG([[ Nemesia crawled back up the stage and approached like a beast. ]])

    MSG([[ What persistence. What could drive her this far? ]])

    MSG([[ I understood all too well that she has an unwavering conviction. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RIR07da")
PLAY_VOICE("lira_1304.wav")
